messages.subject: Info about the Circle Gazette
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, I just wanted to pass on this opportunity for homeschool kids to have their visual or written work published in a newspaper called the Circle
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone,
I just wanted to pass on this opportunity for homeschool kids to have
their visual or written work published in a newspaper called the
Circle Gazette. Info is below. Dora

>
> This is the link: https://www.enrichmentcircle.com/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=143:the-circle-gazette&catid=104:spanish&Itemid=126
>
> The Circle Gazette
>
>
> A Monthly Newspaper - written by children K-12
> Young writers will find in our monthly publication and opportunity
> to tell their stories, express their art, their opinions and have an
> active role in their communities as little reporters!
>
>
> WANTED NOW:
> Young Writers & Journalists, Photographers, Cartoonists, Editors,
> Artists and more!
>
>
>
> Submit your Article to the newspaper here
>
> SECTIONS
>
> Learning Community Coverage
> Stories
> The Poem Corner
> ART BOX
> Letters to the Past
> Literary Reviews
> Field Trips �Experiential Accounts
> FUN CLUBS
> Local Concerns & Entertainment
> Community Reporters � What�s Happening Out
> There?
> Interviewing �
> On Stage - Theater Reviews
> Cinemania - Movie Reviews
> Toys & Games - Reviews
> Bringing the World Closer: National and
> World Issues
> National & World Reporters
> More
>
> Did you know? - Sports, History & Science Trivia
> Announcements
>
> Classifieds
>
> GUIDELINES TO SUBMIT YOUR WORK
>
> You can submit your work directly online here
> Submit your Article to the newspaper here
> Or
> Written work
> If typed please email in microsoft word or open office format
> If handwritten please snail mail a COPY (do not send originals) to:
> The Circle Gazette
> 7551 Normande Ct
> Margate FL 33063
>
> Art Work
> Please snail mail a COPY (do not send originals) to the above address.
>
> Advertising
> Interested in selling an add space to support the newspaper? contact
> us at info@...
>
>
> Patty Gomez
> THE ENRICHMENT CIRCLE
> www.enrichmentcircle.com
> 954-918 2541
>
>
>
>
> Hotmail: Trusted email with Microsoft�s powerful SPAM protection.
> Sign up now.
